org.apache.solr.cloud

Class Overseer.Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.cloud.Overseer.Stats
  • Enclosing class:
    Overseer

    public static class Overseer.Stats
extends Object
    Used to hold statistics about overseer operations. It will be exposed to the OverseerCollectionProcessor to return statistics. This is experimental API and subject to change.
